title: Analyze Equipment Fuel Consumption
description: A farm manager wants to analyze the fuel consumption of their tractors to identify inefficient machines or operators.

tasks.description: Retrieve fuel consumption and operating hour data from the telematics system for all tractors over the last month.
Calculate the average fuel consumption (gallons per hour) for each tractor.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent calculates the fuel efficiency for each machine.

tasks.description: Generate a report that benchmarks each tractor against the fleet average and flags any machines with abnormally high fuel consumption for inspection.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent identifies one tractor that is 20% less efficient than the others and recommends it be checked for maintenance issues.
